mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART VALUES ( SEQ_CART_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ productNo }, #{ userId }, #{ productCount }, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.CART_NO, A.USER_ID, A.PRODUCT_COUNT, A.REG_DATE, A.CHECK_STATUS, B.* FROM TBL_CART A JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.PURCHASE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT A.CART_NO, A.USER_ID, A.PRODUCT_COUNT, A.REG_DATE, A.CHECK_STATUS, B.* FROM TBL_CART A JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.CHECK_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.PURCHASE_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_CART A WHERE A.CART_NO = #{ cartNo }
mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_PWD, A.USER_NAME, A.USER_TEL, A.ADDRESS, A.USER_EMAIL, A.USER_ROLE, A.USER_ACTIVE, A.USER_ENTDATE, A.USER_POINT FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_ACTIVE = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT VALUES ( SEQ_PAYMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{usedPoint}, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverTel}, #{address}, SYSDATE, '배송 준비중', #{deliveryRequires} )

INTO TBL_ORDER ( -- ORDER_NO, PAYMENT_NO, CART_NO ) VALUES ( -- GET_SEQ, SEQ_PAYMENT_NO.CURRVAL, #{cart.cartNo} )
SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO, A.USER_ID, A.USED_POINT, A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, A.PAYMENT_METHOD, A.RECEIVER_NAME, A.RECEIVER_TEL, A.ADDRESS, A.PAYMENT_DATE, A.SHIPPING_STATUS, A.DELIVERY_REQUIRES FROM TBL_PAYMENT A WHERE A.PAYMENT_NO = #{paymentNo}

SELECT A.PAYMENT_NO, A.USER_ID, A.USED_POINT, A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, A.PAYMENT_METHOD, A.RECEIVER_NAME, A.RECEIVER_TEL, A.ADDRESS, A.PAYMENT_DATE, A.SHIPPING_STATUS, A.DELIVERY_REQUIRES FROM TBL_PAYMENT A JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT A.ORDER_NO, B.PAYMENT_NO, C.CART_NO FROM TBL_ORDER A JOIN TBL_PAYMENT B ON A.PAYMENT_NO = B.PAYMENT_NO JOIN TBL_CART C ON A.CART_NO = C.CART_NO WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId}
